resources.string: "Vula okokufundisa kwe-\"Explore by touch\""
"Okokufundisa kokufinyelela"
"Okulandelayo"
"Okwangaphambilini"
"Qeda"
"Phuma"
"Ukuthinta kukhutshaziwe uma okokufundisa kukhuluma"
"Isifundo 1: Ukuhlola isikrini"

"Uma i-Explore by Touch ikhanyiseiwe, ungathinta isikrini ukuze ufunde ukuthi yini okungaphansi komunwe wakho. Isibonelo, isikrini samanje sinezithonjana zohlelo lokusebenza. Thola esisodwa ngokuthinta isikrini bese uhambise umunwe wakho."
"Kuhle. Qhubeka ngokuslayida umunwe wakho esikrinini kuze kube yilapho usuthole okungenani isithonjana esisodwa"
"Futhi ungahlola ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho wesokunxele nesokudla noma ikuphi esikrinini. Zama ukuswayipha kusuka kwesokunxele kuya kwesokudla ukuze uye esithonjaneni esilandelayo."
"Ukuze usebenzise into ethile oyihlolile, thepha isikrini kabili. Hlola uze uthole isithonjana se-%1$s. Bese uthepha kabili noma ikuphi esikrinini ukuze uyisebenzise."
"Uthole isithonjana se-%1$s. Thepha kabili noma ikuphi esikrinini ukuze usebenzise isithonjana."
"Ngaphambilini uhlole isithonjana se-%1$s. Zama ukuhlola isikrini uze uthole isithonjana se-%1$s futhi."
"Ukuze uye esifundweni esilandalayo, thola inkinobho ye-%1$s, ebekwe phansi kwesokudla esikrinini, bese chofoza kabili ukuze uyisebenzise."
"Isifundo 2: Ukuskrola ohlwini"

"Ukuze uskrole ohlwini, ungaslayida iminwe emibili esikrinini. Isibonelo, isikrini samanje siqukethe uhlu lwamagama ezinhlelo zokusebenza olungaskrola phezulu noma phansi. Okokuqala, zama ukuhlola isikrini bese ukhombe uhlelo lokusebenza."
"Manje beka iminwe emibili entweni esohlwini bese uslayida yomibili iminwe phezulu. Uma ufika ngenhla kwesikrini, phakamisa iminwe yakho, uyibeke ezansi kohlu, bese uqhubeke nokuslayida uye phezulu."
"Hlola isikrini ukuze uthole uhlelo lokusebenza olungaphezulu."

"Futhi ungahambisa ekhasini lonke ngokuswayipha umunwe wakho. Ukuze uhambise ekhasini elilandelayo, swayipha ngakwesokudla usebenzisa ukuhamba okukodwa. Zama ukuhambisa ekhasini elilandelayo ngokuswayipha ngakwesokuhla bese ngakwesokunxele."
"Hlola isikrini futhi ukuze uthole uhlelo lokusebenza ekhasini lamanje."

"Ukuswayipha engxenyeni ebhekene, kwesokunxele bese kwesokudla ngokunyakaza okukodwa, kuzoya ekhasini langaphambillini. Zama ukuhambisa ekhasini langaphambilini ngokuswayipha ngakwesokunxele bese ngakwesokudla."
"Ukuze uye esifundweni esilandelayo, thola futhi usebenzise inkinobho %s, engakwesokudla phansi nesikrini."
"Isifundo 3: Ukufunda ngohlamvu"

"Ngokuzenzakalelayo, ukuswayipha amabhulogi okufunda kwesokunxele nakwesokudla ombhalo onke ngesikhathi esisodwa. Futhi ungafunda kumabhulogi ombhalo okungewona owesikrini ngegama noma ngohlamvu. Okokuqala, iya kokulandelayo okuqala ngegama elithi \"Lokhu\"."

"Okulandelayo, ungaqala ukufunda leli bhulogi ngeleveli ethize ngokuswayiphela phansi bese phezulu ngokunyakaza okukodwa. Zama ukuswayiphela phansi ukushintsha ileveli yokufunda, bese uswayiphele ngakwesokudla ukuze ufunde embhalweni."

"Ukuze uphume kubhulogi lamanje lombhalo, uzodinga uzodinga ukubuyela kuleveli yokuzenzakalelayo yokufunda. Swayipha izindwo ezibhekene, phezulu naphansi, ukuze ubuyele kuleveli yokufunda yangokuzenzakalela. Bese thola inkinobho %s phansi kwesokudla bese uyithephe kabili ukuze uyisebenzise bese uyaphuma kokufundisa."

"Lesi isibonelo sebhulogi enkulu yombhalo. Ungahamba kulo mbhalo ngeleveli ethile yokufunda usebenzisa izitho zokuswayipha, noma ufunde wonke ngesikhathi esisodwa usebenzisa izitho zokuthinta."

"Lesi isigaba sesibili."

"Lesi isigaba sesithathu futhi esokugcina. Swayipha phezulu naphansi ukuze ushintshe ileveli yokufunda, bese uswayipha kwesokunxele ukuze ufunde lo mbhalo."
